Subsection.Text: The department shall, by rule, establish fees as follows:

SubParagraph.Text: Application and examination fee: not less than $25 or more than $75.
Initial registration fee: not less than $50 or more than $100.
Renewal of registration fee: not less than $50 or more than $100.

Paragraph.Text: For master septic tank contractor registration:

SubParagraph.Text: Application and examination fee: not less than $25 or more than $75.
Initial registration fee: not less than $50 or more than $100.
Renewal of registration fee: not less than $50 or more than $100.

Paragraph.Text: Certification of partnerships and corporations: not less than $100 or more than $250.

Subsection.Text: Fees established pursuant to subsection (1) shall be based on the actual costs incurred by the department in carrying out its registration and other related responsibilities under this part.
